description: Scenario forced experiment with prescribed land surface climatology derived from transient 30 year running mean.
keywords: LS3MIP, Tier 1, Historical Scenario, Prescribed land 30yr running mean
long_name: prescribed land surface climatology derived from 30 yr running mean
rationale: Diagnose land-climate feedback including ocean response. For diagnosing shifts in the regions of strong land-atmosphere coupling, and shifts in potential predictability related to land surface states.

requirements.description: Historical scenario, from 1980 to the end of the 21st century
requirements.label: 1980-2100 121yrs

requirements.description: 30 year running mean land surface forcing.  Note the climatological median of soil water and snow water is to be used instead of climatological means.
requirements.keywords: LFMIP, 30 year running mean, land surface forcing
requirements.label: LFMIP-RAForcing

requirements.description: An ensemble of at least one simulation
requirements.keywords: minimum 1, at least 1, ensemble, run, simulation
requirements.label: MinimumOne

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, ESM, Atmosphere-Ocean, Earth System, Model, Configuration
requirements.label: AOGCM/ESM Configuration
